duties_responsibilities.duty: Support implementation of new markets and approved process/technology enhancements in the region.
Improve the regional service delivery in line with agreed SLAs.
Coordinate financial aspects on the regional level.
Deliver and analyze agreed reporting (incl. KPIs) on the regional level.
Ensure continuous exchange of information with the BCD Travel Global Program Manager.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Travel Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
